data.text: @DavidBieleski And I'd like to win lotto. But we all know winning lotto is unlikely and going back to 2019,even less so...

@DavidBieleski Amazing isn't it? Two years with no work and I never thought of throwing a tantrum on the lawns of Parliament. I didn't choose to loose my business, they did. #endtheprotest #gohome #Clownvoy2022NZ
@DeniseinWLG Hoping that all those working in the travel industry an extraordinary bonce-back in demand over this next year. Good luck with your business!

@DavidBieleski I started a small travel related business in 2018, as an extra source of retirement income. I pulled the plug in 2020. I took on other work to tide me over, and now I'm getting back into the travel field again. Not what I planned but that's life.

@JennyDu31030810 Literally the first line of my post:

"I also used to run travel agencies prior to COVID-19."
@DavidBieleski Whose we? Nothing in your profile suggests you are a travel agent.
@JennyDu31030810 We made record profits for several years prior to COVID. We were doing quite well, but thanks.
@DavidBieleski Travel agents have been going down the tubes for years.
@DavidBieleski We could protest for the government to turn back time and make it 2019 again, but they probably wouldn't do it.
